creditline: Gift of Jack A. and Aviva Robinson
description: Cloth band. Red wool ground with fine polychrome silk embroidery in chain stitch (tambour work?) Striped woven cotton binding applied on the bias. The embroidery is presently hand stitched to a fabric covered mount; the verso is not visible. Stitched to a black wool covered strainer. (wood)
medium: Silk, wool; chain stitch, double chain stitch
title: At torba ilgich
